visual_storytelling.description: Cinematic and graphic novel composition techniques - how master directors and artists frame scenes

painting_technique.description: Pure painting approaches from master artists - focused on technique and visual treatment

ghibli-composition.description: Studio Ghibli's cinematic landscape approach with humans small in vast environments
ghibli-composition.base_prompt: Studio Ghibli style wide establishing shots with characters small in vast landscapes, horizontal composition with multiple layered depth planes, soft watercolor rendering technique, gentle natural lighting filtering through atmosphere, negative space used as compositional breathing room
ghibli-composition.lighting_approach: Soft, diffused natural light creating gentle atmospheric mood

arcane-framing.description: Fortiche/Arcane's dramatic character-focused cinematography with mixed media aesthetics
arcane-framing.base_prompt: Fortiche Arcane style dramatic close-ups with dynamic camera angles, high contrast lighting creating sharp shadows and bright highlights, mixed media technique with smooth character focus against painterly textured backgrounds, vertical emphasis with cinematic crop ratios
arcane-framing.lighting_approach: High contrast dramatic lighting with strong directional shadows

kibuishi-world.description: Kazu Kibuishi's detailed architectural world-building with isometric clarity
kibuishi-world.base_prompt: Kazu Kibuishi Amulet style detailed environmental composition, isometric or elevated perspective showing architectural systems, warm enclosed lighting suggesting interior spaces, rich mechanical and architectural details distributed throughout the frame, multiple focal points for visual exploration
kibuishi-world.lighting_approach: Warm, diffused interior lighting creating cozy enclosed atmosphere

spiderverse-dimensional.description: Spider-Verse's innovative mixed animation with comic book graphic elements
spiderverse-dimensional.base_prompt: Spider-Verse style mixed animation techniques combining multiple visual approaches, comic book halftone dot patterns and Ben-Day dots, dynamic perspective with dimensional depth effects, bold graphic design elements integrated naturally, multiple focal points creating visual rhythm across the frame
spiderverse-dimensional.lighting_approach: Bold graphic lighting with comic book color separation effects

nolan-cinematic.description: Christopher Nolan's practical effects-driven cinematic realism with dramatic architectural perspectives
nolan-cinematic.base_prompt: Christopher Nolan style cinematic realism with practical effects aesthetic, dramatic architectural perspectives emphasizing scale and geometry, high-contrast naturalistic lighting with deep shadows, wide-angle establishing shots showing spatial relationships, visual metaphors for time and space through environmental design, IMAX-quality photographic clarity
nolan-cinematic.lighting_approach: High-contrast naturalistic lighting with dramatic shadows and practical light sources

turner-atmospheric.description: J.M.W. Turner's luminous atmospheric technique where light dissolves form
turner-atmospheric.base_prompt: J.M.W. Turner style atmospheric luminism with golden light dissolving and emerging from forms, soft focus throughout composition, luminous passages where paint itself seems to glow, forms suggested rather than defined by light, atmospheric perspective creating infinite depth
turner-atmospheric.color_philosophy: Golden and warm light palette with forms emerging from luminous atmosphere
turner-atmospheric.brush_approach: Soft, blended brushwork where edges dissolve into light
turner-atmospheric.light_focus: Light as the primary subject with forms secondary to atmospheric effects

monet-impressionist.description: Claude Monet's broken brushwork technique capturing fleeting light effects
monet-impressionist.base_prompt: Claude Monet style impressionist technique with broken visible brushstrokes capturing fleeting effects of light and atmosphere, colors that interact and influence each other optically, emphasis on temporal specificity and momentary atmospheric conditions, loose brushwork suggesting form through color temperature and value
monet-impressionist.color_philosophy: Colors that interact optically to create new emotional temperatures and atmospheric effects
monet-impressionist.brush_approach: Quick confident strokes that capture essence and light rather than precise form
monet-impressionist.light_focus: Fleeting effects of light and atmosphere as primary subject matter
